1.2.name: wordpress/logoreplacer
1.2.description: This plugin replace WP default admin/login/register page. The technique used is pretty brutal but the best currently possible, the plugin replaces the modified files automatically. To make the plugin run the web server must be able to write to the wp-admin directory. more info @ http://www.bisontech.net
